name: Sunstone Hotel Investors, Inc.
description: Sunstone Hotel Investors, Inc. is a real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on the hospitality sector, primarily investing in luxury and upper-upscale hotels. Founded in 2004 and headquartered in San Clemente, California, the company aims to drive sustainable growth through its strategic portfolio of high-quality hotels that are well-located in key markets across the United States. Sunstone's diverse portfolio includes properties such as Marriott, Hilton, and Hyatt brands, which benefit from the increasing demand for travel and tourism. The company is committed to enhancing shareholder value through disciplined capital allocation, strategic investments, and operational excellence. Sunstone Hotel Investors also emphasizes strong environmental, social, and governance (ESG) practices, integrating sustainability into its operations and development projects. With an experienced management team and a focus on high-demand markets, Sunstone is well-positioned to capitalize on trends in the hospitality industry, including the recovery of leisure and business travel post-pandemic.
